discourse_list.title: Would the launch of CBDC be beneficial to MakerDAO and DeFi?

content.content: When do you think the US Treasury will launch a USD digital currency (CBDC)? Essentially disintermediating financial instutions as a currency distribution channel would be a game changer and potentially an existential threat to TradFi’s funding. With the massive collapse of UST, its safe to assume CBDC or stablecoin regulation is coming or maybe both. Imagining a world were both US CBDC and DAI coexist, I think DAI would have many more use cases in DeFi that I dont foresee CBDC will have given CBDC wallets will most likely require a formal account registration, aside of being a digital store of value and cheaper/faster payments. If CBDC’s launch is succesful though that might mean strong demand for DAI/CBDC PSM in the future. Crazy to think about. Is there a CU or team in MakerDao that would be responsible for assessing the impact of CBDC?
It could be positive in the sense that it would be much easier to wrap fiat for use in Defi, and that wrapped CBDC could be used as another collateral for Dai, just as USDC makes up 52% of Dai.

You are right, CBDC will practically make it easier for people who do not know how the electronic financial world works to know and use it easily, thus making people migrate to DEFI platforms, just imagine this: CBDC  CEX  Wallet Dex  Protocols DEFI If at the moment it is difficult for people to understand cryptocurrencies (which is the main impediment for ordinary people to invest in them) and there is still 0.9T in capitalization market, just imagine when it is common to handle electronic money. Of course it has its negative side, decentralization can be in the background, but DEX will still exist and its use will increase, also eventually people who have a large capital will only use DEX’s, smart money will not move in CEX’s or CBDC. I will attach the following graphs to know the impact that can come.  IMG_20220623_2319191080×1542 185 KB   Estadsticas-de-Internet-2019_China1000×592 12.4 KB   IMG_20220623_2322151080×1590 188 KB  Here we can see how the daily use of Smartphones helped to increase the use of the Internet Moral of the story: Make a task easier for a human being, and they will do it more often.

IMG-20220624-WA00031024×531 31.4 KB  Most USD is already digital, and you are right the spike in adoption of virtual currency could be driven by smartphone demand increase. I hope it CBDC launches before the next bull cycle, it would be huge for MKR.
